title: Development of Augmented Reality-Based Elementary English Vocabulary Learning Modules

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance professional workers' practical English proficiency in a vocabulary learning environment utilizing AR technology

learning_goals: Learners can identify over 100 job-related English vocabulary items with 80% accuracy in an AR environment.
Learners can explain real-world applications of vocabulary using visual and auditory cues through augmented reality.
Learners can apply acquired vocabulary to real-work simulations via project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
